Title: Diabetic (or) Snowflake (or) Snowstorm Cataract
ProbableCases: A **65** year old **diabetic** patient with C/O both eye **progressive painless loss of vision** over the past one year. On Examination, there is a **greyish white reflex** in the pupillary area of the right eye.
